statements: DELETE FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE completed = true AND production_date = '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE id = 1 AND product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01' OR quantity < 100;
DELETE FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_count > 10 AND batch_number = 'ABC123';
DELETE FROM quality_control WHERE passed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM ingredients WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND ingredient_quantity > 100;
